程序包 org.mockito.internal.stubbing.answers

Answers for stubbed calls.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AnswerFunctionalInterfaces
    Functional interfaces to make it easy to implement answers in Java 8
    AnswersWithDelay
    Returns as the provided answer would return, after delaying the specified amount.
    CallsRealMethods
    Optional Answer that adds partial mocking support Answer can be used to define the return values of unstubbed invocations.
    ClonesArguments  
    DefaultAnswerValidator  
    DoesNothing  
    InvocationInfo  
    Returns  
    ReturnsArgumentAt
    Returns the passed parameter identity at specified index.
    ReturnsElementsOf
    Returns elements of the collection.
    ThrowsException
